title: Fabulous spacious 3 bedroom home for rent
description: Peace and tranquility in this custom remodeled corner home. This home has been lovingly redone over the past few years with custom touches like a hidden storage area inside a pillar, a whole house fan and an exhaust fan with thermostat control to recirculate hot air back to the downstairs. Accent lighting throughout the front yard with a small pond and waterfall feature. Enjoy your oasis from the charming screened in front porch! The formal dining room boasts cove lighting, custom chair rail and shadow boxing. The gourmet kitchen includes a glass block bar with lighting, wood cabinets with soft closing features on all drawers and cabinets, granite countertops with Ogee edging, ample direct and accent lighting to make this your dream kitchen! The smoked glass pocket door leads to the oversized laundry area. The Living Room offers a custom oak fireplace mantle as a focal point for the dramatic cathedral ceiling of tongue and grove pinewood. The wood burning fireplace insert adds warmth with a thermostat controlled blower. This home has so much to offer and is a delight to see.
